title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request. The cancel button should either be disabled or the cancellation request should be honored. To achieve this, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass false for the cancelable parameter.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the exception breakpoint configuration.
3. Add a new exception breakpoint.
4. Observe that the progress dialog closes immediately.
5. Wait for the exception list to come up.
6. Attempt to cancel the progress dialog and observe if the cancellation request is honored or if the cancel button is disabled.
